name: Mr. Kougar
overview:
Mr. Kougar was produced by ATW USA in 1984.

A platform/run 'n jump game where you play Mr. Kougar to eat all of the dots distributed through several platforms which are the favorite places of Banalets, the Kougar's enemies. Touching one of the eggs will make Mr. Kougar temporarily invincible and will let a fairy out as it will kill any enemy as it finds its way to the top of the screen or will free a Banalet, adding one more enemy for Mr. Kougar to defeat.
